disp-quote.p: “A loved one falls ill, he goes to the ETC, that’s it. You will never see him again or better let’s say it’s a separation without possibility of seeing each other again.” (nurse and nun, ID#19)
“A funeral without saying goodbye to the deceased!! That is a curse, that is.”
FGD participants cited poor quality of care in the ETC as a reason for failing to present to a treatment centre when EVD is suspected
